ping.name: Ping

classes.name: Chat
classes.description: Represents a chat between one or more users.

params.name: client
params.description: The instantiating client

params.name: threadID
params.description: The ID of the thread

params.name: data
params.description: The data for the chat

props.name: client
props.description: The client that instantiated this

props.name: id
props.description: The ID of the chat

props.name: messages
props.description: The messages in the chat.

props.name: users
props.description: The users in the chat.

props.name: leftUsers
props.description: The users that left the chat.

props.name: adminUserIDs
props.description: The IDs of the administrators of the chat.

props.name: lastActivityAt
props.description: The last time the chat was active.

props.name: muted
props.description: Whether the account has muted the chat.

props.name: isPin
props.description: Whether the account has pinned the chat.

props.name: named
props.description: Whether this chat has a specific name (otherwise it's the default name).

props.name: pending
props.description: Whether the chat is waiting for the account approval.

props.name: isGroup
props.description: Whether the chat is a group.

props.name: type
props.description: The type of the chat.

methods.name: approve
methods.description: Approve the chat if it's pending.

methods.name: markMessageSeen
methods.description: Mark a message of the chat as seen

params.name: messageID
params.description: The ID of the message to mark as seen

methods.name: deleteMessage
methods.description: Delete a message of the chat

params.name: messageID
params.description: The ID of the message to delete

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.description: Send a message in the chat

params.name: content
params.description: The content of the message to send

methods.name: sendPhoto
methods.description: Send a photo in the chat

params.name: file
params.description: The photo to send

classes.name: InstaClient
classes.description: InstaClient, the main hub for interacting with the Instagram API.

props.name: user
props.description: The bot's user object.

props.name: ready
props.description: Whether the bot is connected and ready.

props.name: cache
props.description: The bot's cache.

methods.name: fetchUser
methods.description: Fetch a user and cache it.

params.name: query
params.description: The ID or the username of the user to fetch.

params.name: force
params.description: Whether the cache should be ignored

methods.name: handleRealtimeReceive
methods.description: Handle Realtime messages

methods.name: handleFbnsReceive
methods.description: Handle FBNS messages

methods.name: login
methods.description: Log the bot in to Instagram

params.name: username
params.description: The username of the Instagram account.

params.name: password
params.description: The password of the Instagram account.

params.name: state
params.description: Optional state object. It can be generated using client.ig.exportState().

events.name: messageCreate
events.description: Emitted when a message is sent in a chat the bot is in

params.name: message
params.description: The message that was sent

events.name: messageDelete
events.description: Emitted when a message is deleted in a chat the bot is in

params.name: message
params.description: The message that was deleted

events.name: newFollower
events.description: Emitted when someone starts following the bot

params.name: user
params.description: The user that started following the bot

events.name: followRequest
events.description: Emitted when someone wants to follow the bot

params.name: user
params.description: The user who wants to follow the bot

events.name: pendingRequest
events.description: Emitted when someone wants to send a message to the bot

params.name: chat
params.description: The chat that needs to be approved

classes.name: ClientUser
classes.description: Represents the logged in client's Instagram user.

params.name: client
params.description: The instantiating client

params.name: data
params.description: The data for the client user.

props.name: allowContactsSync
props.description: Whether the user has enabled contact synchronization

props.name: phoneNumber
props.description: The phone number of the user

props.name: client
props.description: The client that instantiated this

props.name: id
props.description: The ID of the user

props.name: followers
props.description: Collection of users that follow this user.<info>You have to use user.fetchFollowers() to fill the collection</info>

props.name: following
props.description: Collection of users this user follows.<info>You have to use user.fetchFollowing() to fill the collection</info>

props.name: privateChat
props.description: Private chat between the client and the user.

props.name: username
props.description: The username of the user

props.name: fullName
props.description: The full name of the user

props.name: isPrivate
props.description: Whether the user is private

props.name: isVerified
props.description: Whether the user is verified

props.name: isBusiness
props.description: Whether the user is a business profile

props.name: avatarURL
props.description: The URL of the user's avatar

props.name: biography
props.description: The biography of the user

props.name: mediaCount
props.description: The number of media published by the user

props.name: followerCount
props.description: The number of followers of the user

props.name: followingCount
props.description: The number of followed users by the user

props.name: totalIgtvVideos
props.description: The number of videos published by IGTV

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: Fetch the user to access all the properties

methods.name: fetchFollowers
methods.description: Fetch the users that follow this user

methods.name: fetchFollowing
methods.description: Fetch the users that follow this user

methods.name: follow
methods.description: Start following a user

methods.name: unfollow
methods.description: Stop following a user

methods.name: block
methods.description: Block a user

methods.name: unblock
methods.description: Unblock a user

methods.name: approveFollow
methods.description: Approve follow request

methods.name: denyFollow
methods.description: Reject follow request

methods.name: removeFollower
methods.description: Remove the user from your followers

methods.name: send
methods.description: Send a message to the user

params.name: content
params.description: The content of the message to send

params.name: client
params.description: The instantiating client

params.name: threadID
params.description: The ID of the thread

params.name: data
params.description: The data for the message

props.name: client
props.description: The client that instantiated this

props.name: id
props.description: The ID of the message

props.name: chatID
props.description: The ID of the chat the message was sent in

props.name: type
props.description: The type of the message

props.name: timestamp
props.description: The timestamp the message was sent at

props.name: authorID
props.description: The ID of the user who sent the message

props.name: chat
props.description: The chat the message was sent in

props.name: author
props.description: The author of the message

methods.name: markSeen
methods.description: Mark the message as seen.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Delete the message

methods.name: reply
methods.description: Reply to the message

params.name: content
params.description: The content of the message
